## Validator.normalizeCollectionPath() method

Normalized collectionPath is '' or path strings that has a trailing slash and no heading slash. Root ('/') is not allowed. Backslash \\ or yen Â¥ is replaced with slash /.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static normalizeCollectionPath(collectionPath: CollectionPath | undefined): CollectionPath;
```
